paramInformation.label: Led Indication Mode
paramInformation.description: 1: show dimmer state 2 : show night mode 3: one flash mode

paramInformation.label: Restore Dimmer State
paramInformation.description: 0 : dimmer off 1 : last dimmer state 2 : dimmer on

metadata.inclusion:
1.check Z-WaveTM Controller entered inclusion mode.
2.Pressing Include button of PAD09 three times within 2 seconds will 
enter inclusion mode.
metadata.exclusion:
1.check Z-WaveTM Controller entered exclusion mode.
2.Pressing Include button of PAD09 three times within 2 seconds will 
enter exclusion mode
metadata.reset:
1. Pressing Include button of PAD09 three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion mode. 
2. Within 1 second, press Include button of PAD09 again for 5 seconds. 
3. IDs are excluded. 

note : Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
